terms.title: Terms & Conditions
terms.bannerDescription: Welcome to KrishiGo! By accessing or using our app, you agree to the following Terms & Conditions. Please read them carefully.
terms.summaryText: KrishiGo is built to make farming fun, rewarding, and sustainable. Play fair, respect the rules, and together we'll grow knowledge and sustainability. üåçüíö

1.title: Acceptance of Terms
1.content: By downloading, registering, or using KrishiGo, you agree to comply with these Terms. If you do not agree, please do not use the app.

2.title: Eligibility
content: The app is designed for young farmers and youth (18+ years).
Users under 18 must have parental/guardian consent.
You agree to provide accurate registration details (name, age, email/phone).

3.title: Use of the App
content: KrishiGo is for educational and entertainment purposes related to agriculture and sustainability.
You agree not to misuse the app for fraudulent activities, hacking, or unauthorized access.
Quiz answers must be given fairly‚Äîno cheating or use of automated tools.

4.title: Points & Rewards
content: Points are earned through quizzes, challenges, and in-app activities.
Points have no cash value outside the app unless converted through authorized reward mechanisms.
Conversion of points to money or vouchers is subject to availability, verification, and KrishiGo policies.
KrishiGo reserves the right to modify, suspend, or discontinue reward programs at any time.

5.title: Sustainability & Content
content: Quiz content is for awareness and learning purposes only.
KrishiGo does not guarantee that following suggested practices will result in specific farming outcomes.
Users should consult agricultural experts before applying any techniques in real farming.

6.title: Privacy & Data
content: We respect your privacy. Your data will be used only for app functionality, rewards distribution, and improving user experience.
We may share aggregated (non-personal) data for research and reporting purposes.
By using the app, you consent to our data practices outlined in the Privacy Policy.

7.title: Prohibited Activities
7.subtitle: You agree not to:
content: Create multiple fake accounts to exploit rewards.
Sell or transfer points/accounts without KrishiGo's permission.
Spread harmful, misleading, or offensive content.

8.title: Limitation of Liability
content: KrishiGo is not responsible for technical issues, network failures, or delays in reward redemption.
We are not liable for financial, farming, or personal losses arising from the use of our app.
All use of the app is at your own risk.

9.title: Modifications & Updates
content: KrishiGo may update these Terms anytime. Changes will be notified in-app or on our website.
Continued use of the app means you accept the updated Terms.

10.title: Contact Us
10.content: For questions, feedback, or concerns regarding these Terms, please contact us at:

about.title: About KrishiGo
about.bannerWelcome: Welcome to KrishiGo ‚Äì where farming meets fun, learning, and rewards! üöú‚ú®
about.bannerDescription: KrishiGo is a gamified platform designed for young farmers and agri-enthusiasts who want to learn, engage, and contribute to sustainable farming practices while earning exciting rewards.
about.missionText: To empower the next generation of farmers with knowledge, motivation, and incentives that make agriculture smarter, greener, and more sustainable.

features.title: Play Quizzes
features.description: Learn about modern farming, sustainability, and best agri-practices.

features.title: Earn Points
features.description: Every correct answer gives you points for your knowledge and effort.

features.title: Claim Rewards
features.description: Redeem your points for vouchers, agri-products, or exclusive discounts.

features.title: Convert to Money
features.description: Use your points to unlock financial benefits and farming resources.

benefits.title: For Farmers
benefits.description: Practical tips, eco-friendly methods, and a chance to earn while learning.

benefits.title: For Youth
benefits.description: A fun, engaging way to connect with agriculture and contribute to a sustainable future.

benefits.title: For the Environment
benefits.description: Promoting reduced chemical use, water conservation, and healthier farming practices.

impacts: Encouraging young farmers to adopt sustainable practices.
Making agriculture exciting through quizzes, challenges, and community competitions.
Building greener ecosystems while rewarding knowledge and action.
about.closing: üëâ With KrishiGo, farming isn't just about growing crops its about growing knowledge, rewards, and a sustainable future. üå±üí°
